AboutUsDetail.title: About Us
right_side_text_list: We believe, the careful the selection, the tastier the tea
We source our tea leaves from north India’s tier-1 gardens
Zero artificial flavors to enhance the real taste of desi tea
Brewed to perfection so you can enjoy & unwind
left_side_text_list: Hand pounded ginger from local produce to give you the 'Maa ke haath ki Ghar waali Kadak chai'
Prepared by our expert chefs in the most hygienic conditions since safety is our priority
We use Fresh milk and RO purified water. Quality is the heart of our family.
100% Sulphur free sugar is used in every cup because we value your health.

OurVision.title: OUR VISION
OurVision.description: We are here to bring the numero uno tea experience that Tea Time gives to as many villages, towns, cities and countries as we can, while building sustainable growth for farmers and empowering local Entrepreneurship. We know the tea that Indians love, that's the taste we built.

OurMission.title: OUR MISSION
OurMission.description: We are on a mission to add value to the lives of our fast-growing community – our customers, farmers, franchisees, employees, and our investors. Every cup counts towards bringing joy that’s mutual!

AboutFounder.title: About Founder
AboutFounder.sub_title: Tea Time is a product that has reached millions of people and aims to connect more with our very own blends of tea.
AboutFounder.description: Uday’s vision to empower common class population and determination to bridge the gap that existed in the accessibility and affordability of premium quality products to common people is what led to India’s largest tea chain.
